The company leases store properties rented from real estate owners to store entrants. It also sells real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Tenpo Renovation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tenpo Innovation Co., Ltd. in May 2013. Tenpo Innovation Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Tenpo Innovation Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Crops Corporation.

3490.T.summary: Azplanning Co.,Ltd. engages in the real estate development business in Japan. It is involved in the real estate and business hotel trading activities; leasing of buildings for business, such as stores, offices, warehouses, etc., as business hotels; and provision of real estate management intermediary, architectural renovation, and real estate management incidental services. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Kawaguchi, Japan.

3494.T.summary: Mullion Co., Ltd. provides real estate services in Japan. It owns and manages real estate properties, including residential, store, office properties, as well as offers real estate securitization services. The company also purchases and sells real estate properties. Mullion Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3495.T.summary: Koryojyuhan Co., Ltd. operates as a real estate company. It provides rental agency and monthly apartment handling services; and elderly housing and pay nursing home facilities. The company is also involved in the real estate brokerage and purchase/sale businesses; sale of residential land; and development and sale of real estate properties. In addition, it provides leasing management services, including rental management, vacant house management, and subleasing services; and revenue real estate consulting services. Further, the company operates coin parking, coin laundry, and trunk room and bike garage; and photovoltaic power generation facility. Koryojyuhan Co., Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Mito, Japan.

3496.T.summary: AZoom co., Ltd. engages in buying and selling, mediation, management, and leasing of real estate. It is also involved in business development through Internet; Internet media development and operation; and management of parking lots. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3497.T.summary: Legal Corporation engages in the real estate business. It is involved in the housing and commercial development, and conversion and renovation; real estate consulting; facility management; and nursing care businesses. The company also offers real estate rental Services. Legal Corporation was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

3521.T.summary: Econach Holdings Co.,Ltd. engages in the spa business in Japan. The company also manages stocks, as well as sells and leases real estate properties. In addition, it manufactures and sells embroidered laces for women's outerwear. The company was formerly known as Econach Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Econach Holdings Co.,Ltd. in August 2010. The company was founded in 1926 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3603.HK.summary: Xinji Shaxi Group Co., Ltd, an investment holding company, operates and manages hospitality supplies and home furnishing shopping malls in the People's Republic of China. The company has three shopping malls for hospitality supplies and two shopping malls for home furnishings. It also rents hospitality supplies; provides exhibition management services; and operates an online shopping mall. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

3662.HK.long_name: Aoyuan Healthy Life Group Company Limited
3662.HK.summary: Aoyuan Healthy Life Group Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides property management and commercial operational services in the People's Republic of China. The company offers property management services for high-end residence communities, commercial complexes, apartments, office buildings, villas, tourist towns, etc.; sales assistance services to property developers comprising cleaning, security, and maintenance of pre-display units and sales offices; and community-value added services to property owners or residents. As of December 31, 2019, the company provided property management services to 94 properties in 38 cities covering 13 provinces, municipalities, and autonomous regions in China involving a total gross floor area of 15.1 million square meters. It also provides commercial operational services for shopping malls comprising pre-planning, commercial design, technical consultation, business tenant sourcing agency, preparation for business grand opening, and asset operation, etc. In addition, the company offers traditional Chinese medicine, medical beauty, elderly care, and telecommunication services. Aoyuan Healthy Life Group Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is based in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China. Aoyuan Healthy Life Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Main Trend Limited.

3750.T.summary: FRACTALE Corporation engages in the financial, real estate, and asset management businesses in Japan. The company was formerly known as Seven Seas Holdings Co.,Ltd. FRACTALE Corporation was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3990.HK.summary: Midea Real Estate Holding Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a property developer in the People's Republic of China. It develops and sells residential and industrial properties; and provides commercial and residential property management services, as well as support services for preliminary sales of real estate developments, and other value-added property services. The company also invests in and operates commercial properties, such as urban complexes, community neighbourhood, shopping malls, characteristic commerce, cultural tourism projects, long-term rental apartments, offices, hotels, and other shops. In addition, it is involved in prefabricated construction and smart home solutions businesses. Midea Real Estate Holding Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.

3KR.ST.summary: Tre Kronor Property Investment AB (publ) owns, manages, and develops commercial real estate properties in Sweden. The company is based in Stockholm, Sweden. Tre Kronor Property Investment AB (publ) operates as a subsidiary of Catella AB.

3RR.F.summary: RomReal Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in property investment and development in Romania. The company owns a portfolio of properties, primarily in Constanta and Ovidiu. Its plots are primarily suited for residential and commercial developments. As of December 31, 2019, the company's land bank comprised 275,835 square meters. RomReal Limited was founded in 2005 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.

3S5.F.long_name: Red Star Macalline Group Corporation Ltd.
3S5.F.summary: Red Star Macalline Group Corporation Ltd. operates and manages home improvement and furnishings shopping malls. The company operates its shopping malls under the Red Star Macalline brand name. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 92 Portfolio shopping malls and 273 managed shopping malls; 11 home furnishing shopping malls through strategic cooperation; and 476 home improvement material stores/industry streets. The company also engages in the leasing of floor areas to the tenants; retail sale of home furnishing merchandise, as well as provision of related decorating services; and sale of pre-paid cards. In addition, it offers Internet home decoration, Internet retail, and logistics and delivery services; joint marketing; and shopping mall design, construction, consultation, and home design and decoration services, as well as construction site coordination and supervision services. Further, the company provides site leasing management, warehouse logistics, asset and investment management, exhibition, financing, equipment leasing, and enterprise management services. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Red Star Macalline Home Living and Decorating Company Limited and changed its name to Red Star Macalline Group Corporation Ltd. in 2011. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Red Star Macalline Group Corporation Ltd. is a subsidiary of Red Star Macalline Holding Group Company Limited.

4150.SR.summary: Arriyadh Development Co. builds, manages, rents, and sells facilities, commercial and residential buildings, service buildings, public parks, and tourism and residential compounds in Saudi Arabia. It is also involved in the management, rental, and sale of construction projects, and commercial and industrial exhibitions. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

41O.SI.summary: LHN Limited, an investment holding company, provides real estate management services in Singapore, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Thailand, Cambodia, Myanmar, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Space Optimisation Business, Facilities Management Business, and Logistics Services Business. The company leases and manages industrial spaces, such as industrial buildings, factories, warehouses, and land for open storage; commercial spaces consisting of traditional offices, suited offices, recreational spaces, sports facilities, and children enhanced spaces; and residential spaces. It also offers facilities management services, which include security management services; car park management services; and repair and maintenance, cleaning, landscaping, and amenities and utilities. In addition, the company operates a fleet of prime movers, trailers, oil tankers, ISO tankers, and trucks to handle the transportation of various types of oil, and oil-related and petrochemical products, as well as containers. Further, it provides container depot management services, which include container handling and storage, surveying, cleaning, and repair and maintenance services to shipping lines and container leasing companies. The company also engages in the food and beverage catering business. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Singapore. LHN Limited is a subsidiary of Fragrance Ltd.

4250.SR.summary: Jabal Omar Development Company operates as a real estate development company in Saudi Arabia. It engages in the investment, development, management, and sale of the Jabal Omar project in Makkah. It is also involved in the construction, maintenance, management, demolishing, surveying, furnishing, and operation of hotels. The company operates hotels, including the Marriott, a five-star hotel with 426 rooms and suites; the Hilton Suites, a five-star hotel with 484 suites; the Hyatt Regency, a five-star hotel with 657 rooms and suites; and the Conrad, a five-star hotel with 438 rooms and suites; and the Hilton. It also develops residential projects; and commercial center. The company provides logistic services. Jabal Omar Development Company was founded in 2006 and is based in Mecca, Saudi Arabia.

4437.T.summary: gooddays holdings, Inc. leases housing properties in Japan. It also provides IT services. The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4M2B.SG.summary: Amasten Fastighets AB (publ) builds, develops, and manages real estate properties in Sweden. It also develops and manages housing properties. The company was formerly known as Amasten Holding AB (publ) and changed its name to Amasten Fastighets AB (publ) in November 2017. Amasten Fastighets AB (publ) is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

4V1.F.summary: VGP NV, together with its subsidiaries, develops, builds, owns, manages, and leases logistics and semi-industrial real estate, and ancillary offices. It leases its properties to tenants in logistic sector, including storing, assembling, re-conditioning, and final treatment of the goods. The company also offers asset and property management services; and facility management services, such as maintenance, waste management, greenery maintenance services, etc. It operates in Germany, Spain, Austria, the Netherlands, Italy, Portugal, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, Romania, and Latvia. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Antwerp, Belgium.

4WF.F.long_name: Wharf Real Estate Investment Company Limited
4WF.F.summary: Wharf Real Estate Investment Company Limited, an investment holding company, invests in, develops, owns, and operates real estate properties in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and Singapore. The company operates through Investment Properties, Development Properties, and Hotels segments. It primarily operates Harbour City, a commercial space comprising offices, retail shops, serviced apartments, hotels and club, and car parking spaces; and Times Square, a retail space that consists of office and car parking spaces. The company also operates Wheelock House and Crawford House commercial properties; The Murray, a luxury hotel that consists of 336 rooms; Plaza Hollywood, a shopping mall with retail outlets, restaurants, and a stadium housing six-screen cinema multiplex; and The Star Ferry, which provides a ferry service between Tsim Sha Tsui and Wan Chai. In addition, it offers leasing, finance, and management services; and accepts bank deposits. Wharf Real Estate Investment Company Limited was founded in 1886 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

53U.F.summary: Altus Group Limited provides software, data solutions, and independent advisory services to the commercial real estate (CRE) industry in Canada, the United States, Europe, and the Asia Pacific. It operates in three segments: Altus Analytics, Commercial Real Estate Consulting (CRE Consulting), and Geomatics. The Altus Analytics segment offers ARGUS Enterprise (AE), a software for CRE valuation and portfolio management; ARGUS Developer and ARGUS EstateMaster software for development feasibility analysis; ARGUS API, an application programming interface; ARGUS Voyanta, a cloud-based data management solution; ARGUS Taliance, a cloud-based fund solution for alternative investment firms; and ARGUS Acquire, a cloud-based deal management solution for CRE acquisitions. It also offers data subscription products that provide real estate information on the residential, office, industrial, and investment markets; advisory and managed services; and technology-related services. This segment serves large owners, managers, and investors of CRE asset and funds; service providers; brokers; and developers. The CRE Consulting segment offers real estate property tax services, including assessment reviews, management, and appeals, as well as personal property, and state and local tax advisory services; valuation services, such as appraisals of real estate portfolios and valuation of properties, as well as due diligence, and litigation and economic consulting services; and construction feasibility study, budgeting, cost and loan monitoring, and project management services to owner operators, developers, financial institutions, and CRE asset holders and investors. The Geomatics segment offers various services, including land surveys and mapping to the oil and gas exploration and development sector for setting of property boundaries, route and corridor selection, land settlement, construction developments, and oil field and well-sites. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.

5525.TW.summary: Sweeten Real Estate Development Co.,Ltd. constructs and develops residential, commercial, and industrial projects. It is also involved in urban renewal development and land development activities. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

584.SI.summary: OEL (Holdings) Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the property management business in Singapore. It is also involved in the rental of properties; and ship repairing business. The company was formerly known as Oakwell Engineering Limited and changed its name to OEL (Holdings) Limited in November 2013. OEL (Holdings) Limited was founded in 1984 and is based in Singapore.

5DP.SI.summary: Heeton Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the hospitality business in Singapore, Thailand, Australia, Japan, Malaysia, Vietnam, and the United Kingdom. It operates through Hospitality, Property Investment, and Property Development segments. The company engages in the development and sale of private residential properties, as well as provides property management services. It also leases residential, retail, and commercial properties. In addition, the company owns, manages, and franchises hotels and related services; and provides administrative and management services. As of December 31, 2019, it operates 13 hotels. Heeton Holdings Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Singapore.

5JK.SI.summary: Hiap Hoe Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a real estate company that develops a portfolio of hospitality, retail, commercial, and residential assets in Australia, Singapore, and the United Kingdom. It develops luxury and mid-tier residential, and hotel-cum-commercial properties. It operates through Development Properties, Rental, Leisure, Hotel Operations, and Trading Investments segments. The Development Properties segment acquires land/property and develops them into residential/industrial/commercial properties for sale. The Rental segment engages in the business of renting space under the investment properties, as well as plant and equipment. The Leisure segment provides leisure and recreational facilities, including bowling, billiard, and amusement centers under the SuperBowl brand. The Hotel Operations segment operates hotels under the brand names of Ramada Singapore, Days Hotel Singapore, Holiday Inn Express Trafford City, Four Points by Sheraton Melbourne, and Aloft Perth. The Trading Investments segment trades in a portfolio of quoted and unquoted investments. The company is also involved in the provision of civil engineering, general road construction, and sub-contractor works. Hiap Hoe Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Singapore. Hiap Hoe Limited is a subsidiary of Hiap Hoe Holdings Pte Ltd.

5PB.F.summary: Purplebricks Group plc engages in the real estate agency business in the United Kingdom. It provides services relating to the sale and letting of properties. The company also combines local property experts and technologies to make the process of selling, buying, or letting a property more convenient, transparent, and cost effective under the Purplebricks brand name. Purplebricks Group plc was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Solihull, the United Kingdom.

5WF.SI.summary: ISOTeam Ltd. operates in the building maintenance and estate upgrading industry in Singapore. The company operates through Repair and Redecoration; Addition and Alteration; Coatings and Paintings; and Others segments. It offers waterproofing and reroofing, improvement works, and routine maintenance services, as well as repainting, repair, and redecoration services; neighborhood renewal, hawker centers upgrading, estate upgrading, home improvement, and electrical load upgrading services; and interior design and fitting out, designing and building, home retrofit and fit-out, and property maintenance and enhancement services. The company also provides thermal insulating plasters, anti-slip floor coatings, green label intumescent fire proofing coatings, composite timber decking, renewable energy installation, and cockroaches and odor remover services; vertical gardens, horticultural, maintenance, floating wetlands, niche landscaping, and gardening and landscaping maintenance services; home care and upgrading, and general repairs and maintenance services; home painting services; and architectural and engineering solutions, including commercial addition and alteration works, building services, engineering works, architectural and commercial interior construction solutions, and advanced building technologies. In addition, it offers eco-friendly, architectural and protective, fireproofing, and industrial coating, as well as new build painting services; and electrical and mechanical ventilation works, air conditioning works, sanitary and plumbing, solar panel installation, and energy performance contract services. Further, the company leases boom, scissor, personnel, and forklifts, as well as telehandlers; and provides bike sharing services through a mobile app. It primarily serves town councils, government bodies, and private sector building owners. ISOTeam Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Singapore.

600064.SS.summary: Nanjing Gaoke Company Limited engages in real estate development business in China. The company's property portfolio includes ordinary residential properties, high-grade villas, commercial real estate properties, affordable housing properties, and other fields. The company also provides environmental protection project construction; municipal infrastructure construction; engineering design; property management; self-owned housing; and construction and installation services. In addition, the company is involved in industrial investment, venture capital investment, investment management, equity investment, and consulting activities; and provision of financial services. Further, it engages in sewage treatment, water supply, and flood control activities; and research and development, production, and sale of pediatric, cardiovascular and cerebrovascular, anti-infective, digestive system, anti-tumor, and external medicine products. Nanjing Gaoke Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is based in Nanjing, China.

600275.SS.summary: Hubei Wuchangyu Co., Ltd. engages in real estate business in China. The company develops, operates, and distributes commercial properties, as well as provides housings leasing and broking services. It also cultivates fresh water fishes and other aquatic products. The company is based in Ezhou, China.

600393.SS.summary: Guangzhou Yuetai Group Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate development, construction, operation, and management businesses in China and internationally. It primarily operates under the Yuetai brand name. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Donghua Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangzhou Yuetai Group Co., Ltd. in May 2016. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

600466.SS.summary: Sichuan Languang Development Co., Ltd. engages in real estate and pharmaceutical manufacturing businesses in China. The company develops and operates residential properties; and commercial properties, including cultural tourism, hotel, and office buildings, as well as offers landscape and decoration services. It also researches and develops stem cell bio-ink technology for 3D bio-printing; and researches and develops, and marketing of pharmaceuticals and medical devices. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Di Kang Technology Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sichuan Languang Development Co., Ltd. in April 2015. Sichuan Languang Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China. Sichuan Languang Development Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Blue Light Investment Holdings Group Co., Ltd.

600604.SS.summary: Shanghai Shibei Hi-Tech Co.,Ltd. invests in, develops, rents, and sells real estate properties in China. The company was founded in 1923 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600615.SS.summary: Shanghai Fenghwa Group Co., Ltd engages in the property and hotel management business. It also provides house leasing, industrial investment management, etc. services. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Fenghwa Ballpen Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Fenghwa Group Co., Ltd in October 2001. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600620.SS.summary: Shanghai Tianchen Co., Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, provides real estate and transportation logistics services in China. The company develops, constructs, operates, and sells real estate properties, including commercial, residential, and office properties, as well as transforms old areas. It also provides real estate advertising services. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Union Agricultural Co., Ltd. Shanghai Tianchen Co., Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600657.SS.summary: Cinda Real Estate Co., Ltd. operates as a real estate development company in China. The company provides commercial property management; property services; and real estate professional services. Cinda Real Estate Co., Ltd. is based in Beijing, China.

600665.SS.summary: Tande Co., Ltd. operates as a real estate development company in China. It also provides property management and real estate agency services. The company is based in Xi'an, China. Tande Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xi'an Gaoke (Group) Corporation.

600724.SS.summary: Ningbo Fuda Company Limited engages in the real estate development business in China. It develops residential properties; and invests in, develops, operates, and manages commercial real estate projects, as well as offers cement building materials. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Yuyao, China. Ningbo Fuda Company Limited is a subsidiary of Ningbo Urban Construction Investment Holding Co.,Ltd.

600848.SS.summary: Shanghai Lingang Holdings Co.,Ltd. develops, rents, and sells industrial carriers in China. The company's industrial carriers portfolio include technology research and development buildings, headquarters business buildings, bonded logistics warehouses, etc. It is also involved in the park operations and industrial investment activities. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Automation Instrumentation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Lingang Holdings Co.,Ltd in November 2015. Shanghai Lingang Holdings Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600872.SS.long_name: Jonjee Hi-tech Industrial & Commercial Holding Co., Ltd.
600872.SS.summary: Jonjee Hi-tech Industrial & Commercial Holding Co., Ltd. produces and sells seasoning products in China and internationally. Its products include soy sauce, chicken distillate, oyster sauce, preserved bean curd, vinegar, and other seasoning products. The company also provides facilities and services, such as land, factory buildings, and staff dormitories with public facilities; inspection services for construction and safety control; registration for establishing enterprises; real estate management services in the parks; and public environment administration services, etc. In addition, it is involved in the manufacture and sale of precision forging parts of automobiles and motor eyelets; precision forging parts of automobile and motor eyelets; temperature pipe valves; and other machined products, as well as rental and sale of real estate properties. Further, the company produces batteries in various kinds, including rechargeable batteries and battery packs, which are be applied in power tools, R/C toys, emergency lighting, electrical home appliance, portable computers, and cellular and cordless phones. The company was formerly known as Zhongshan Torch Hi-tech Industrial & Commercial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jonjee Hi-tech Industrial & Commercial Holding Co., Ltd. in February 2001. Jonjee Hi-tech Industrial & Commercial Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

601828.SS.short_name: RED STAR MACALLINE GROUP CORP L
601828.SS.long_name: Red Star Macalline Group Corporation Ltd.
601828.SS.summary: Red Star Macalline Group Corporation Ltd. operates and manages home improvement and furnishings shopping malls. The company operates its shopping malls under the Red Star Macalline brand name. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 92 Portfolio shopping malls and 273 managed shopping malls; 11 home furnishing shopping malls through strategic cooperation; and 476 home improvement material stores/industry streets. The company also engages in the leasing of floor areas to the tenants; retail sale of home furnishing merchandise, as well as provision of related decorating services; and sale of pre-paid cards. In addition, it offers Internet home decoration, Internet retail, and logistics and delivery services; joint marketing; and shopping mall design, construction, consultation, and home design and decoration services, as well as construction site coordination and supervision services. Further, the company provides site leasing management, warehouse logistics, asset and investment management, exhibition, financing, equipment leasing, and enterprise management services. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Red Star Macalline Home Living and Decorating Company Limited and changed its name to Red Star Macalline Group Corporation Ltd. in 2011. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Red Star Macalline Group Corporation Ltd. is a subsidiary of Red Star Macalline Holding Group Company Limited.

603506.SS.long_name: Nacity Property Service Group Co., Ltd.
603506.SS.summary: Nacity Property Service Group Co., Ltd. provides real estate property management services in China. It offers case, consultancy, and value-added services for residential properties, commercial complexes, office buildings, industrial parks, schools, banks, and public construction projects, and various other properties. The company was formerly known as Nacity Property Service Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

6093.HK.summary: Hevol Services Group Co. Limited, an investment holding company, provides property management and value-added services in the People's Republic of China. The company provides security, cleaning, greening, gardening, and repair and maintenance services to property owners and residents, as well as property developers. It also offers community value-added services comprises home-living services, including property repair and maintenance, cleaning, interior decoration, collection of electricity tariffs, purchase assistance, and accommodation and catering services to property owners; leasing of common areas, such as swimming pools, car parking spaces, and advertising spaces to third party contractors; and organizing of community cultural activities, which include community sports events, community carnivals, elderly care, and community festival celebrations for residents. In addition, the company provides value-added services, including sales assistance services and management consultation services for the property development projects developed by property developers. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

6177.TW.summary: Da-Li Development Co.,Ltd. operates as a full-service, multi-family, and diversified real estate investment and development company. Da-Li Development Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6192.T.summary: HyAS&Co. Inc. provides real estate services for individuals in Japan. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

6668.HK.summary: E-Star Commercial Management Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides commercial operational services to owners or tenants in respect of commercial properties in the People's Republic of China. It operates through three segments: Entrusted Management Service Model; Brand and Management Output Service Model; and Sublease Service Model. The company offers positioning, construction consultancy, and tenant sourcing services, which primarily include market positioning, business planning consultancy, design and construction consultancy, and tenant sourcing; and operational management services principally comprising formulating operation strategies, conducting marketing and promotional events, tenant and property management, and rent collection. It also provides property leasing services, such as sublease of commercial spaces in the commercial properties managed under the sublease service model to tenants; and value-added services primarily consisting of management of common areas in the shopping centers, which customers could rent for a short period for pop-up shops and promotional settings, and management of advertising spaces, such as LED boards and interior and exterior facades of the shopping centers. The company offers commercial operational services under the brands of COCO Park, COCO City, COCO Garden, iCO, and Top Living. It serves shopping centers, commercial complexes, luxury home furnishing shopping centers, and office buildings, as well as leases commercial spaces to tenants. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. E-Star Commercial Management Company Limited is a subsidiary of Go Star Investment Holding Limited.

6989.HK.long_name: Excellence Commercial Property & Facilities Management Group Limited
6989.HK.summary: Excellence Commercial Property & Facilities Management Group Limited provides commercial property management services in China. It operates through three segments: Property Management Services, Finance Services, and Other Services. The Property Management Services segment offers property management services to property developers, property owners, and tenants, as well as value-added services to such customers, including asset services, which comprise preliminary property consulting, second-hand property leasing and sales agency, asset-light property and space operation, and corporate services. It serves commercial properties, including office buildings and commercial complexes; corporate buildings, and office and R&D parks; public and industrial properties comprising government properties, educational properties, medical properties, storage and logistics centers, and industrial parks; and residential properties, such as residential communities and apartments. The Finance Services segment principally provides micro-lending services to small and medium enterprises, individual business proprietors, and individuals. The Other Services segment offers software development and apartment rental services. The company also provides corporate and specialized value-added, as well as technical maintenance services. Excellence Commercial Property & Facilities Management Group Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

6999.HK.summary: Leading Holdings Group Limited engages in the property development business in China. It operates through Property Development, Commercial Property Investment and Operation, and Hotel Operations segments. The company engages in the development and sale of residential properties for home upgraders; and commercial properties, including office buildings, shopping blocks, commercial complexes, and apartments. It also holds various commercial properties for further investment purpose; engages in hotel management business; and provides project management services. The company was formerly known as Leading China Holdings Limited. Leading Holdings Group Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

6XXH.F.summary: Stenhus Fastigheter i Norden AB (publ), a real estate company, owns and manages public and commercial properties in the Greater Stockholm region of Sweden. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

7187.T.summary: J-Lease Co.,Ltd. engages in the rent debt guarantee business. It also provides real estate rental agency; and administration, management, and buying and selling agency services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8804.T.summary: Tokyo Tatemono Co., Ltd. operates as a real estate company in Japan. The company operates through Commercial Properties, Residence, and Real Estate Service segments. The Commercial Properties segment leases and manages office buildings and commercial facilities. The Residence segment develops and sells condominiums and detached houses; and leases and manages condominiums. The Real Estate Service segment engages in the asset solution, brokerage, consulting, and parking lot operations. The company also engages in the leisure business, which include management and operation of hotels and resort facilities, golf courses, public baths, and spas. Further, the company provides housing and nursing care services for senior citizens. Tokyo Tatemono Co., Ltd. was founded in 1896 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8806.T.summary: Daibiru Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, owns, operates, manages, and leases real estate properties in Japan. It owns and leases 30 properties for offices, hotel buildings, and retail complexes in central Tokyo, Osaka, and Sapporo. The company also leases residence halls for students; and apartment buildings for business people on temporary assignment, as well as condominiums for families. In addition, it offers facility management services; and real estate agency services for office properties, as well as engages in construction works relating to buildings, such as repairs originating from its building maintenance operations. The company was formerly known as Osaka Tatemono Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Daibiru Corporation in January 1992. The company was founded in 1923 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan. Daibiru Corporation is a subsidiary of Mitsui O.S.K. Lines, Ltd.

8818.T.summary: Keihanshin Building Co., Ltd., a building management company, leases buildings in Japan. The company leases office buildings, datacenter buildings, commercial buildings, logistics warehouses, and off-course betting parlors. It is also involved in subcontracting construction work for lease facilities; and the provision of building maintenance services. The company was formerly known as Keihanshin Real Estate Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Keihanshin Building Co., Ltd. in October 2011. Keihanshin Building Co., Ltd. was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8842.T.summary: Tokyo Rakutenchi Co.,Ltd. manages, operates, and rents real estate properties in Japan. The company operates movie theaters, spas, futsal courts, and bowling facilities; and 8 Doutor coffee shops and 1 Excelsior shop in Sosui, as well as 9 stores. It also provides building management services, such as cleaning, facility management, and security for public facilities, offices, shops, and other environments; and handles event planning and management, and various advertising media works. Tokyo Rakutenchi Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8848.T.summary: Leopalace21 Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction, leasing, and sale of apartments, condominiums, and residential housing in Japan. It operates through four segments: Leasing Business; Development Business; Elderly Care Business; and Hotels, Resort and Other Businesses. The Leasing Business segment engages in the leasing and management of apartment buildings and other properties; repair work; broadband internet service; rent obligation guarantee; and company residence agency, solar power generation, and small-amount short-term insurance and other businesses. The Development Business segment is involved in the construction subcontracting of apartments and detached houses; and development of condominiums and others. The Elderly Care Business segment operates elderly care facilities under the Azumi En brand. This segment also offers day services, short stays, elderly homes with nursing care services/residential style elderly homes, home visits, and home care support services. The Hotels, Resort and Other Businesses segment engages in the operation of hotels; operation and management of resort facilities on the island of Guam; and provision of travel agency, clerical agency, and other services. The company was formerly known as MDI Corporation and changed its name to Leopalace21 Corporation in July 2000. Leopalace21 Corporation was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8869.T.summary: Meiwa Estate Company Limited develops, sells, and manages condominiums in Japan. It also engages in real estate leasing and brokerage activities. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8877.T.summary: Eslead Corporation develops and sells family-type and urban condominiums in Japan. The company also rebuilds and sells condominiums. In addition, it is involved in building and condominium management, real estate brokerage, detached house sales, power supply, hotel, and condominium and building cleaning businesses. The company was formerly known as Nihon Eslead Corporation and changed its name to Eslead Corporation in October 2019. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan. Eslead Corporation is a subsidiary of Mori Trust Co., Ltd.

8881.T.summary: NISSHIN GROUP HOLDINGS Company, Limited plans, develops, manages, and sells condominiums under the Palace stage and Duo stage brands. It is also involved in the property rental and real estate businesses. In addition, the company engages in the construction work, civil engineering work, etc.; rental management and remodeling activities; real estate securitization business, such as investment corporation management contracts; and purchase, resale, and renovation business of used condominiums. Further, it offers mortgage guarantee and housing funds loans to condominium buyers; and plans and sells detached houses. NISSHIN GROUP HOLDINGS Company, Limited was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8889.T.summary: Apaman Co., Ltd. operates a real estate portal in Japan. It provides Apamanshop, a real estate portal that provides domestic and overseas rental and monthly property information, and trading and investment property information. The company was formerly known as Apamanshop Holdings Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Apaman Co., Ltd. in January 2018. Apaman Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8890.T.summary: Raysum Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate investment business in Japan. It also operates community hostels; and a specialized surgery center that offers medical care services to assist the elderly. The company was formerly known as Recrm Research Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Raysum Co., Ltd. in 2008. Raysum Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

8893.T.summary: Shin-Nihon Tatemono Co., Ltd. operates as a real estate developer in Japan. The company develops and sells family and compact condominiums, and residential houses, as well as provides real estate solutions. It also manages and sub-leases condominiums and apartments; provides building renovation services; undertakes various construction projects, such as detached housing projects, apartments and condominiums, and commercial facilities; and offers real estate consulting services. Shin-Nihon Tatemono Co., Ltd. was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8903.T.summary: Sunwood Corporation develops and sells condominiums in Japan. It is also involved in the real estate agency and brokerage, operation and management, and renovation and remodeling activities; and real estate renovation for sale. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8908.T.summary: Mainichi Comnet Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the real estate business in Japan. The company is involved in planning, design supervision, consulting, and development of real estate properties; development and management of student apartments and dormitories; purchase of land and buildings; rental of housing and commercial facilities; and advertising agency business. It also engages in the development of sports facilities; and cohabitation, training, and travel planning, as well as conference, international exchange, and auto-car workshop activities. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8909.T.summary: Shinoken Group Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate, general contractor, energy, and life care businesses in Japan and internationally. It designs, constructs, purchases, rents, manages, and sells apartments and condominiums; and offers debt guarantee services, as well as short-term insurance for owners and tenants of apartments and condominiums. The company is also involved in the retail sale of LP gas and electricity to apartments; and owning and operating nursing care facilities. In addition, it operates Kids Life, an after-school daycare service for children with disabilities. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8912.T.summary: Area Quest Inc. provides real estate solutions in Japan. It operates through Tenant Invitation, Update and Contract Management, and Building Management divisions. The company attracts tenants on behalf of building owners and managers; and provides advice and information for solving the problems related to building management, as well as meets the sales needs of building owners. It also provides building management and subleasing services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8914.T.summary: Arealink Co., Ltd. engages in the self-storage business in Japan. The company operates outdoor container type and indoor trunk type self-storage facilities, as well as self-storage facilities under the Hello Storage brand. It also provides rental meeting rooms under the Hello Rental Meeting Rooms brand; and small-scale rental offices under the Hello Office brand. In addition, the company offers land rights management services, including buying land rights from landowners and selling them to leaseholders. Arealink Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8919.T.summary: KATITAS CO., Ltd. purchases, remodels, and sells used homes to individuals and families in Japan. It offers its services through approximately 100 branches. The company was formerly known as Yasuragi Co., Ltd. and changed its name to KATITAS CO., Ltd. in 2013. KATITAS CO., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Kiryu-shi, Japan.

8925.T.summary: ARDEPRO Co., Ltd. engages in real estate revitalization business in Japan. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

8928.T.summary: Anabuki Kosan Inc. engages in the real estate business in Japan. It is involved in the custom home contracting, apartment contracting, real estate distribution, hotel and tenant building management, public facility consignment management, and town planning businesses, as well as sale of houses. The company also provides real estate, facility management, energy saving, condominium management, insurance, senior related, employment support, travel, human resource development, outsourcing, and advertisement services. Anabuki Kosan Inc. was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Takamatsu, Japan.

8934.T.summary: Sun Frontier Fudousan Co., Ltd. provides real estate revitalization and real estate services to building owners, asset holders, and wealthy individuals in Tokyo. It operates through Real Estate Revitalization Business, Real Estate Service Business, Operation Business, and Other segments. The company offers replanning, property management, commercial real estate brokerage, and office and store leasing services, as well as construction and renovation services for commercial properties, office buildings, and condominiums. It also provides building management, construction planning, delinquent rent guarantee, and asset consultancy services. In addition, the company engages in the hotel development and operation business. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8938.T.summary: GLOME Holdings,Inc. engages in the real estate business. The company provides medical operation consolidation; visiting nursing station operation; and medical staff recruitment and medical tourism services. It also offers property management services; renovates medical facilities; and develops related facilities, as well as hospital management support services. In addition, the company is involved in the sale and leaseback of hospital real estate. The company was formerly known as LC Holdings, Inc. and changed its name to GLOME Holdings,Inc. in October 2019. GLOME Holdings,Inc. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8945.T.summary: SUNNEXTA GROUP Inc. provides housing system management outsourcing business in Japan. It also engages in house rental management business; the provision of consultation for reform of housing system works; the provision of outsourcing services in personnel and general affairs; and cost reduction consultation and purchasing agency businesses. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8AS.SG.short_name: Alam Sutera Realty Tbk PT Regis
8AS.SG.summary: PT Alam Sutera Realty Tbk operates as an integrated property developer in Indonesia. The company is involved in the development and management of residential areas, commercial districts, industrial areas, shopping centers, and leisure centers, as well as hospitality facilities. It also provides building management, consultancy, investment, and business management services, as well as money lending services; operates tourism area; and sells goods. The company was formerly known as PT Adhihutama Manunggal and changed its name to PT Alam Sutera Realty Tbk in September 2007. PT Alam Sutera Realty Tbk was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

900902.SS.summary: Shanghai Shibei Hi-Tech Co.,Ltd. invests in, develops, rents, and sells real estate properties in China. The company was founded in 1923 and is based in Shanghai, China.

900928.SS.summary: Shanghai Lingang Holdings Co.,Ltd. develops, rents, and sells industrial carriers in China. The company's industrial carriers portfolio include technology research and development buildings, headquarters business buildings, bonded logistics warehouses, etc. It is also involved in the park operations and industrial investment activities. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Automation Instrumentation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Lingang Holdings Co.,Ltd in November 2015. Shanghai Lingang Holdings Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shanghai, China.

9423.T.summary: Forval RealStraight Inc. provides real estate brokerage and office relocation support services in Japan. It also sells OA communication equipment. The company was formerly known as Fread Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Forval RealStraight Inc. in July 2009. Forval RealStraight Inc. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Forval RealStraight Inc. is a subsidiary of Forval Corporation.

9608.HK.summary: Sundy Service Group Co. Ltd operates as an integrated property management service provider in the property management industry in Zhejiang province, the People's Republic of China. The company provides property management services to 33 properties, including 16 residential properties and 17 non-residential properties. It offers property management services, including security, cleaning, gardening, repair, and maintenance of common areas and common facilities and ancillary services; value-added services to non-property owners, primarily property developers, including consulting services, sales assistance services, and pre-delivery services; and community value-added services to property owners and residents, including property repair and maintenance, waste cleaning, utility fee collection, remodeling, and decoration and community space services, as well as engages in hotel and long-term rental apartment businesses. The company was formerly known as SUNDY HUIDU LIMITED and changed its name to Sundy Service Group Co. Ltd in September 2017. Sundy Service Group Co. Ltd was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

9635.T.summary: Musashino Kogyo Co., Ltd. engages in the film entertainment, real estate, and commercial businesses. The company is involved in the management of movie theaters. It also engages in the leasing, sale, and intermediary of land and buildings; and sale of commercial goods, etc. Musashino Kogyo Co., Ltd. was founded in 1920 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9661.T.summary: Kabuki-Za Co., Ltd. provides lease space for conducting one-day events, group plays, and annual seating. Kabuki-Za Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

9666.HK.long_name: Jinke Smart Services Group Co., Ltd.
9666.HK.summary: Jinke Smart Services Group Co., Ltd. provides property management services to property developers and property owners in China. It offers cleaning, security, greening, repair and maintenance, public area maintenance, and other property management-related services; consultancy services for property developers and property management companies; and smart living technology solutions comprising smart design, smart on-site, and smart integrated operation platform services. The company provides its services to residential and non-residential properties, including mid-to high-end residential properties, commercial and office buildings, industrial parks, educational institutions, and hospitals. The company was formerly known as Jinke Property Service Group Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China. Jinke Smart Services Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jinke Property Group Co., Ltd.

9728.T.summary: Nippon Kanzai Co., Ltd. provides building management and operation, environmental facility management, and real estate fund management services in Japan. It offers building management services, including safety, equipment, and energy, and other management services; and cleaning, cash, security, liaison, and indoor operation, as well as engages in administrative and building repair works. The company also provides engineering services comprising building and seismic diagnosis, repair work, repair plan, database, and engineering report services. In addition, it is involved in the property and residential management, management consulting, temporary staffing, and other businesses. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9761.T.summary: Tokai Lease Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, and leases temporary buildings, and fixtures and fittings in Japan. The company leases temporary buildings for schools, offices, shops, and emergency temporary housing, as well as public facilities, such as police boxes. It also leases and sells office supplies/furniture supplies and air conditioning. Tokai Lease Co., Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

9816.T.summary: Striders Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate, hotel, overseas, and other businesses primarily in Japan. It develops and sells various logistic systems to support logistics operations. The company also offers turnaround consultancy; enterprise reconstruction and reorganization schemes; range of advisory services for mergers and acquisitions; and financial assistance services. In addition, it provides leasing services, such as market research and tenant recruitment, as well as sub-leasing services; collects rent; handles leasing renewal, cancellation, and evacuation contracts; and deals in facility trouble and tenant claims, as well as offers interior decoration and residential property management services. Further, the company offers building management services, including managing mansion units and front staff, cleaning work, and checking and maintaining building equipment, as well as rental and land agency, and rental guarantee services. Additionally, it manufactures and sells Chinese noodles; and owns, operates, and manages Narita Gateway and Kurashiki Royal Art hotels. The company also engages in the advertisement agency business in Indonesia; investment activities; and develops software application programs. Striders Corporation was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9902.TW.summary: Tidehold Development Co., Ltd. engages in the international trade business. It develops and rents residential and other buildings; rents minibus; and sells gas-electric garbage truck businesses. The company was formerly known as Tidehold Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tidehold Development Co., Ltd. in 1998. Tidehold Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

9916.HK.long_name: Xingye Wulian Service Group Co. Ltd.
9916.HK.summary: Xingye Wulian Service Group Co. Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the property management and value-added, property engineering, and ancillary food supply services in Mainland China. The company's property management services include security, cleaning, greening and gardening, parking space management, repair and maintenance, and customer services; and value-added services consisting of repair and maintenance, renovation waste clearance, intermediary leasing services, etc. for office buildings, governmental buildings, and industrial parks, etc. Its property engineering services comprises planning, designing, and installation of security and surveillance, access control, carpark management, and construction site management systems. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, the People's Republic of China.

9928.HK.summary: Times Neighborhood Holdings Limited provides property management and other relevant services primarily to property developers, property owners and residents, and governmental authorities in the People's Republic of China. The company offers property management services for residential properties non-residential properties. The company also provides community value-added services for owners and tenants, including public space leasing and parking space management, and life services for daily needs, including characteristic butler service, community shopping, community announcement, bill payment service, home appliances maintenance and repair, and community event organization service. In addition, it offers elevator services, including sale, installation, repair, and maintenance; intelligent engineering services, including intelligent community supporting services, as well as build intelligent communities with facilities. It manages a portfolio of residential properties; and non-residential properties, such as commercial properties and office buildings, government buildings, industry parks, public facilities, hospitals, airports, schools, and municipal sanitation. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

9940.TW.summary: Sinyi Realty Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real-estate brokerage and development businesses in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company develops, constructs, rents, and sells residential buildings and factories. It is also involved in the real estate management and identification, and real estate marketing planning activities; market information consultation; provision of management consulting, information software, data processing, and electronic information services; and publication business. In addition, the company offers professional construction, building decoration construction, interior decoration, hardware, and general merchandise products and services; and construction materials, furniture, sanitary ware, and ceramic products, as well as engages in the wholesale of building materials. Further, it develops commercial buildings and auxiliary facilities. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

9978.HK.long_name: Fineland Real Estate Services Group Limited
9978.HK.summary: Fineland Real Estate Services Group Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides real estate agency services, property research and consultancy, and integrated services in the People's Republic of China. Its property research and consultancy services include macroeconomic analysis of the market, analysis on investment return, market environment analysis, studies on project conditions, development and positioning, formulating planning and development strategies of the project, recommendations on construction and mix of properties, and recommendations on sales and marketing strategies. The company's real estate agency services comprise marketing research and analysis, target customers analysis, the assessment of market entrance, the strategy of advertising, media, promotion and pricing settling, and the management of selling and after-sales services for the primary market. It also provides secondary market real estate agency services to owners looking to sell or lease their properties, and to potential buyers or tenants looking to buy or rent properties. In addition, the company offers a range of value-added services to customers, including property developers, individual customers, and companies, which include Zhaoshangyi that assists property developers with primary market development projects that have commercial units identify and approach prospective lessees; and operates One-stop Service Centre that provides value-added services, such as rent collection, property repair and maintenance, and design and furnishing services, as well as assists purchasers to obtain ownership certificates and apply for mortgages from banks. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China. Fineland Real Estate Services Group Limited is a subsidiary of Mansion Green Holdings Limited.

9983.HK.summary: Central China New Life Limited, an investment holding company, provides property management services in central China. It operates through three segments: Property Management and Value-Added Services, Lifestyle Services, and Commercial Property Management and Consultation Services. The company manages a portfolio of properties, including residential properties, shopping malls, cultural tourism complexes, commercial apartments, office buildings, schools, and properties of governmental agencies. It also offers consultancy services to property developers, community value-added services, intelligent community services, personalized services to VIPs of the Central China Consumer Club, and real estate marketing services. In addition, the company operates Jianye + platform, an online to offline one-stop service platform that provides customers with goods and services; and offers travel services, as well as management services in Cuisine Henan Foodcourts. Further, it engages in the provision of hotel management and operation services; and management services for agricultural and cultural tourism projects, as well as in the commercial real-estate operations. Additionally, the company provides consultation, engineering installation, and software development of intelligent technology solutions; and property agency services for secondary properties. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China. Central China New Life Limited is a subsidiary of Enjoy Start Limited.

A30.SI.summary: Aspial Corporation Limited, an investment holding company, operates in the real estate, financial service, and jewelry businesses in Singapore, Australia, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Germany, and Ireland. It is involved in the provision of pawn broking and secured lending services; and retail and trading of pre-loved jewelry, timepieces, and bags, as well as branded merchandise. The company engages in the jewelry retail business under the brands of Lee Hwa Jewellery, Goldheart, and Niessing; and gold bullion broking and dealing activities. It is involved in the rental of properties; provision of management and other support services; and jewellery manufacturing and wholesaling activities; operates hotels, resorts, and serviced residences, as well as offers real estate consultancy services. The company was formerly known as Lee Hwa Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to Aspial Corporation Limited in 2001. Aspial Corporation Limited was founded in 1970 and is based in Singapore. Aspial Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of MLHS Holdings Pte. Ltd.

A4Y.DE.summary: ACCENTRO Real Estate AG, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a property company that focuses on residential properties in Germany. The company engages in the operation and trading of residential properties and individual apartments. It is involved in the retail of apartments to owner occupiers and buy-to-let investors; block sale of residential units to institutional investors; and provision of privatization services on behalf of third parties. The company was formerly known as Estavis AG and changed its name to ACCENTRO Real Estate AG in February 2015. ACCENTRO Real Estate AG was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany. ACCENTRO Real Estate AG is a subsidiary of Brookline Real Estate S.Ã  r.l.

A9P.SG.summary: IRSA Propiedades Comerciales S.A. operates as an investment arm of IRSA Inversiones y Representaciones S.A. Alto Palermo S.A. engages in the ownership, acquisition, development, leasing, management, and operation of shopping centers, as well as residential and commercial complexes in Argentina. As of June 30, 2007, it owned and operated ten shopping centers covering a total of 264,995 square meters in Argentina, including six in the Buenos Aires metropolitan area and four in the provinces of Cordoba, Mendoza, Salta, and Santa Fe; and a condominium called Torres de Abasto located in front of the Abasto Shopping Center in Buenos Aires. The company offers leases to retail tenants in its ten shopping centers; administration and maintenance of common areas; administration of contributions made by tenants to finance promotional efforts for the shopping centers; and parking lot services for visitors. The company also offers credit card consumer finance service, through the issuance of its Tarjeta Shopping and Tarjeta Shopping Metroshop credit cards, for consumers at shopping centers, hypermarkets, and street stores. It also engages in the development and sale of residential properties, and acquisition and sale of undeveloped parcels of land for future development. In addition, it engages in the development of condominiums associated with its shopping centers. The company was founded in 1889 and is headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

AANNF.summary: Aroundtown SA, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a real estate company in Germany, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom, Belgium, and internationally. It invests in commercial and residential real estate properties, such as office, hotel, logistics, wholesale, retail, and other properties. The company was formerly known as Aroundtown Property Holdings PLC and changed its name to Aroundtown SA in September 2017. Aroundtown SA was founded in 2004 and is based in Luxembourg City, Luxembourg.

ABCP.summary: AmBase Corporation does not have significant operations. Previously, it invested in a real estate development property in New York, New York; and owned, operated, and managed a commercial office building. AmBase Corporation was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Boca Raton, Florida.

ABHA.SG.summary: Hasen-Immobilien AG engages in the real estate business. It operates in portfolio and real estate management businesses, as well as develops properties. The company is based in Augsburg, Germany.

ABT.MI.summary: Abitare In S.p.A. develops, constructs, and sells residential buildings and apartments in Milan. The company is based in Milan, Italy.

ACNDF.summary: Ascendas India Trust (a-iTrust) was listed on the Singapore Exchange Securities Trading Limited (SGX-ST) in August 2007 as the first Indian property trust in Asia. Its principal objective is to own income-producing real estate used primarily as business space in India. a-iTrust may also develop and acquire land or uncompleted developments primarily to be used as business space, with the objective of holding the properties upon completion. As at 31 December 2019, a-iTrust's asset under management stands at S$2.1 billion. a-iTrust's portfolio comprises seven world-class IT business parks and one logistics park in India, namely the International Tech Park Bangalore, International Tech Park Chennai and CyberVale in Chennai, CyberPearl, The V and aVance in Hyderabad, aVance in Pune and Arshiya warehouses near Mumbai. a-iTrust is structured as a business trust, offering stable income distributions similar to a real estate investment trust. a-iTrust focuses on enhancing shareholder value by actively managing existing properties, developing vacant land in its portfolio, and acquiring new properties. a-iTrust is managed by Ascendas Property Fund Trustee Pte. Ltd. The trustee-manager is a wholly owned subsidiary of Singapore-listed CapitaLand Limited, one of Asia's largest diversified real estate groups.

ACU.AX.summary: Acumentis Group Limited provides valuation, research, and advisory services in relation to property and businesses in Australia. The company offers residential property valuation, government, commercial property valuation, insurance valuation, rural and agribusiness, property advisory, quantity surveying, buyers agency, illicit substance screening, projects division, self-managed super funds property assessment, stamp duty assessment, family law and litigation, and homebuilder grant valuation services. It serves the private owner and investor, professional/SME, corporate, government, banking, finance, REIT, and development industries. The company was formerly known as LandMark White Limited and changed its name to Acumentis Group Limited in January 2020. Acumentis Group Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Sydney, Australia.

ADGR.TA.summary: Adgar Investments and Development Ltd engages in the real estate activities in Israel, Canada, Poland, and Belgium. The company primarily invests in office properties. It also develops income-producing office assets through land purchases and utilization of land reserves associated to various property holdings. The company is based in Petah Tikva, Israel.

ADJ.DE.summary: ADLER Group S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a residential real estate company in Germany. The company operates through Residential Property Management and Privatization segments. It is involved in the rental and management of residential properties, including modernization and maintenance of residential properties, management of tenancy agreements, and marketing of residential units. The company also engages in holding, operating, and selling commercial units; and the modernization, maintenance, and management of non-vacant units. As of December 31, 2018, its property portfolio consisted of 22,067 residential units with a total residential lettable area of 1,454,255 square meters; 1,450 commercial units, such as retail, office, and other commercial units with a total commercial lettable area of 171,199 square meters; and 5,401 parking spaces and spaces for storage, antennas, etc. The company was formerly known as ADO Properties S.A. and changed its name to ADLER Group S.A. in October 2020. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Senningerberg, Luxembourg. ADLER Group S.A. is a subsidiary of ADO Group ltd.

ADJ.F.summary: ADLER Group S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a residential real estate company in Germany. The company operates through Residential Property Management and Privatization segments. It is involved in the rental and management of residential properties, including modernization and maintenance of residential properties, management of tenancy agreements, and marketing of residential units. The company also engages in holding, operating, and selling commercial units; and the modernization, maintenance, and management of non-vacant units. As of December 31, 2018, its property portfolio consisted of 22,067 residential units with a total residential lettable area of 1,454,255 square meters; 1,450 commercial units, such as retail, office, and other commercial units with a total commercial lettable area of 171,199 square meters; and 5,401 parking spaces and spaces for storage, antennas, etc. The company was formerly known as ADO Properties S.A. and changed its name to ADLER Group S.A. in October 2020. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Senningerberg, Luxembourg. ADLER Group S.A. is a subsidiary of ADO Group ltd.

ADL.DE.summary: ADLER is one of Germany's leading residential property companies with a focus on affordable housing. Its portfolio is primarily located in Â or on the outskirts of Â large and growing conurbations in northern, eastern and western Germany and has considerable upside potential in terms of revaluation gains, vacancy reduction and rent uplifts. All of the Group's properties and business operations are located in Germany, and benefit from the high employment in the German economy in general and also favourable real estate market dynamics in German ÂB cities'. The Group's residential portfolio has been built up over the past five years by acquiring individual portfolios or shares in property holding companies.

AFPR.TA.summary: AFI Properties Ltd engages in the initiation, establishment, preparation, and operation of industrial buildings, offices, and commercial premises in Israel and Europe. It is involved in the development and operation of various projects that include shopping malls, logistics parks, office complexes, and residential properties. The company was formerly known as Africa Israel Properties Ltd. and changed its name to AFI Properties Ltd in July 2019. AFI Properties Ltd was founded in 1971 and is based in Yahud, Israel.

AGGHF.summary: Agrios Global Holdings Ltd. operates as a data analytics driven agriculture technology and services company. The company leases and manages properties and equipment for eco-sustainable agronomy and provides advisory services to support various aspects of aeroponic cultivation in the cannabis sector in the state of Washington. Agrios Global Holdings Ltd. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.

AGR.F.summary: AGROB Immobilien AG develops, manages, and operates commercial real estate properties in Germany. It operates in three segments: Altus Analytics, Commercial Real Estate Consulting (CRE Consulting), and Geomatics. The Altus Analytics segment offers ARGUS Enterprise (AE), a software for CRE valuation and portfolio management; ARGUS Developer and ARGUS EstateMaster software for development feasibility analysis; ARGUS API, an application programming interface; ARGUS Voyanta, a cloud-based data management solution; ARGUS Taliance, a cloud-based fund solution for alternative investment firms; and ARGUS Acquire, a cloud-based deal management solution for CRE acquisitions. It also offers data subscription products that provide real estate information on the residential, office, industrial, and investment markets; advisory and managed services; and technology-related services. This segment serves large owners, managers, and investors of CRE asset and funds; service providers; brokers; and developers. The CRE Consulting segment offers real estate property tax services, including assessment reviews, management, and appeals, as well as personal property, and state and local tax advisory services; valuation services, such as appraisals of real estate portfolios and valuation of properties, as well as due diligence, and litigation and economic consulting services; and construction feasibility study, budgeting, cost and loan monitoring, and project management services to owner operators, developers, financial institutions, and CRE asset holders and investors. The Geomatics segment offers various services, including land surveys and mapping to the oil and gas exploration and development sector for setting of property boundaries, route and corridor selection, land settlement, construction developments, and oil field and well-sites. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.

The Company derives lease revenue though specialized, dynamic and proactive property management and adds value to its properties through improvements, expansion of leasable area, and occupation costs reduction. BR Properties focus on tenant relationships, providing them with effective real estate solutions and anticipating market trends and client's needs. The Company prefers to acquire commercial properties that are already generating lease revenue, carefully evaluating the credit information of the properties' tenants. BR Properties continuously monitor the Brazilian commercial real estate market to anticipate trends and understand supply and demand in the various regions in which we are active, so that the Company can evaluate acquisition opportunities and realize gains from the sale of properties that have appreciated in value. Its business strategy includes sale-leaseback transactions, built-to-suit rentals, and development of commercial properties mainly for leasing as part of Company's commercial property rental portfolio.
